  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Connecting three capacitors in four ways</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anschließen von von drei Kondensatoren in vier 
Möglichkeiten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Relier trois condensateurs de quatre voies</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conectando três capacitores em quatro maneiras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Collegamento dei tre condensatori in quattro 
modi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνδεση τριών πυκνωτών με τέσσερις τρόπους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conectar tres condensadores de cuatro maneras</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows: three capacitors connected in series (a), three capacitors connected in parallel (b), two capacitors in parallel connected in series with the third capacitor (c), and two capacitors in series connected in parallel with the third capacitor (d).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Capacitance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Capacitors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Circuits</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">parallel connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">series connection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar: drei 
Kondensatoren schlossen in Serie (a), in drei Kondensatoren, die in 
Ähnlichkeit (b) angeschlossen wurden, in zwei Kondensatoren in der 
Ähnlichkeit an, die in der Reihe mit dem dritten Kondensator (c) 
geschaltet wurde, und in zwei Kondensatoren in den Serien, die 
parallel zu dem dritten Kondensator (d) angeschlossen wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre : trois 
condensateurs se sont reliés en série (a), trois condensateurs 
reliés en parallèle (b), deux condensateurs en parallèle relié en 
série au troisième condensateur (c), et deux condensateurs en série
reliés parallèlement au troisième condensateur (d).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra: três capacitores
conectaram em série (a), três capacitores conectados na paralela 
(b), dois capacitores na paralela conectada em série com o terceiro 
capacitor (c), e dois capacitores em série conectados na paralela com
o terceiro capacitor (d).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra: tre 
condensatori hanno collegato in serie (a), tre condensatori collegati 
parallelamente (b), due condensatori parallelamente collegato in serie
con il terzo condensatore (c) e due condensatori in serie collegato in
parallelo con il terzo condensatore (d).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει: τρεις πυκνωτές που 
συνδέθηκαν στη σειρά (α), τρεις πυκνωτές παράλληλα παράλληλο (β),
δύο παράλληλα παράλληλο πυκνωτών που συνδέθηκαν σύνδεσαν στη 
σειρά με τον τρίτο πυκνωτή (γ), και δύο πυκνωτές στη σειρά που 
συνδέθηκε παράλληλα με τον τρίτο πυκνωτή (δ).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra: tres 
condensadores conectaron en la serie (a), tres condensadores 
conectados en el paralelo (b), dos condensadores en el paralelo 
conectado en serie con el tercer condensador (c), y dos condensadores 
en las series conectadas en paralelo con el tercer condensador (d).</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
